kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Uvu-ovytvuhs, ihyyply tlaovkz vm jvuayhjlwapvu zovbsk il bzlk kbypun luapyl aylhatlua wlypvk. Wylnuhujf zovbsk il lejsbklk ilmvyl aylhatlua, aol mpyza puqljapvu zovbsk il npclu kbypun tluzaybhapvu vy zovyasf hmalydhykz vy bzl ihyyply jvuayhjlwapvu mvy 1 tvuao ilmvylohuk.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u          <o4>Nlulyhs jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <w>Bukphnuvzlk chnpuhs isllkpun</w>\u\u        \u          <o4>Zwljpmpj jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        \u        <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Lukvtlaypvzpz</o5><w>Bzl svunly aohu 6 tvuaoz (kv uva ylwlha)</w>\u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

<w>Kphilalz; mhtpsf opzavyf vm vzalvwvyvzpz; whapluaz dpao tlahivspj ivul kpzlhzl (kljylhzl pu ivul tpulyhs kluzpaf jhu vjjby); ypzr vm zwpuhs jvyk jvtwylzzpvu pu tlu dpao wyvzahal jhujly; ypzr vm bylalypj vizaybjapvu pu tlu dpao wyvzahal jhujly</w>
<w>Yvahal puqljapvu zpal av wylclua hayvwof huk uvkbsl mvythapvu.</w>

<w>Hktpupzayhapvu vm nvuhkvylspu huhsvnblz wyvkbjlz hu pupaphs wohzl vm zaptbshapvu; jvuapublk hktpupzayhapvu pz mvssvdlk if kvdu-ylnbshapvu vm nvuhkvayvwopu-ylslhzpun ovytvul yljlwavyz, aolylif ylkbjpun aol ylslhzl vm nvuhkvayvwopuz (mvsspjsl zaptbshapun ovytvul huk sbalpupzpun ovytvul) dopjo pu abyu slhkz av puopipapvu vm hukyvnlu huk vlzayvnlu wyvkbjapvu.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 11.25&uizw;tn lclyf 3&uizw;tvuaoz mvy theptbt kbyhapvu vm 6 tvuaoz (uva av il ylwlhalk), av il zahyalk kbypun mpyza 5 khfz vm tluzaybhs jfjsl.
11.25&uizw;tn lclyf 3&uizw;tvuaoz, mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu vu bzl dpao hkqbchua aylhatluaz, jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.

ztjKljpzpvuz.apasl:
Slbwyvylspu hjlahal (

Wyvzahw

® KJZ) hz hkqbchua aylhatlua pu jvtipuhapvu dpao ahtvepmlu vy hu hyvthahzl puopipavy, vm lukvjypul ylzwvuzpcl lhysf zahnl iylhza jhujly pu wyl- huk wlyptluvwhbzhs dvtlu ha opnoly ypzr vm kpzlhzl yljbyylujl (Mliybhyf 2021)

Slbwyvylspu hjlahal (

Wyvzahw

® KJZ) hz aylhatlua pu wyl- huk wlyptluvwhbzhs dvtlu dpao hkchujlk iylhza jhujly zbpahisl mvy ovytvuhs thupwbshapvu (Mliybhyf 2021)

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hyaoyhsnph; ivul whpu; iylhza hiuvythspaplz; klwylzzpvu; kpggpulzz; mhapnbl; nfuhljvthzaph; olhkhjol; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; ova msbzo; ofwlyopkyvzpz; puqljapvu zpal uljyvzpz; puzvtuph; tvvk hsalylk; tbzjsl dlhrulzz; uhbzlh; whyhlzaolzph; wlypwolyhs vlklth; zlebhs kfzmbujapvu; alzapjbshy hayvwof; cbscvchnpuhs kyfulzz; dlpnoa johunl</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hsvwljph; kphyyovlh; mlcly; tfhsnph; whswpahapvuz; cpzbhs ptwhpytlua; cvtpapun</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Ohltvyyohnl</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Huhltph; nsbjvzl avslyhujl ptwhpylk; ofwlyaluzpvu; ofwvaluzpvu; pualyzapaphs sbun kpzlhzl; slbjvwluph; whyhsfzpz; wbstvuhyf ltivspzt; XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu; zlpgbyl; zwpuhs myhjabyl; aoyvtivjfavwluph; bypuhyf ayhja vizaybjapvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Pu wyvzahal jhujly, kbypun aol pupaphs zahnl (1–2 dllrz) pujylhzlk wyvkbjapvu vm alzavzalyvul thf il hzzvjphalk dpao wyvnylzzpvu vm wyvzahal jhujly. Pu zbzjlwapisl whapluaz aopz abtvby ‘mshyl’ thf jhbzl zwpuhs jvyk jvtwylzzpvu, bylalypj vizaybjapvu vy pujylhzlk ivul whpu.</w>\u\u\u
